name: Beef Barley Noodle Soup
ingredients: 8-­‐10 cups water 1/2 box of 11 oz. box Quick Barley
6-­‐8 cubes beef boullion 2-­‐3 cups frozen mixed veggies
2 lbs. browned ground beef garlic salt
12 oz. pkg wide egg noodles pepper
1/2 cup dried onion or 1 med. chopped onion) Worcestershire Sauce to taste
steps: Put browned/drained ground beef in soup pot. Add all of the rest of ingredients in there also. Bring to boil for
